transArray.content: The so-called parent-child room is really small. You have to go to bed when you enter the door. It belongs to the kind where two beds are squeezed out. Although the front desk has also been vaccinated in advance, there is still a little difference in the real scene and photos. difference. But the location is very good, there is a shopping mall next to it, it is convenient to eat, and it is very close to Sanyuanqiao subway station.
